name: Race Ball 3D: Tap Color Dash
description:
Welcome to Race Ball 3D! The most addictive and challenging game full of jumping balls and rolling discs that will test your reflexes and reaction time. Once you start you won't be able to stop!

Just tap on the screen to make the ball jump from one rotating disc to another. Don't forget to collect gems on the road to progress to the next stage.

Download the game today for FREE and start challenging your friends to see who will get the highest score.
Have fun and enjoy!
